title: Finding The Characteristics
text: Since this parabola is already in standard form, we know that the vertex is $$(-1,4)$$ and $$p=\frac{1}{2}$$. This means that the focus is $$(-1, 4.5)$$ and the directrix is $$y=3.5$$
